contentrichtext.text: '''Copley''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} == People == * [[Copley (surname)]] == Places == ;Australia * [[Copley, South Australia]] ;England * [[Copley, County Durham]] * [[Copley, Greater Manchester]] in Cheshire * [[Copley, West Yorkshire]] ;Wales * [[Copley, Swansea]] ;United States of America * [[Copley, Ohio]] *[[Copley, West Virginia]] * [[Copley Square]] in Boston ** [[Copley (MBTA station)]], at that square * [[Fairmont Copley Plaza]] Hotel in Boston * [[Coplay, Pennsylvania]] == Other uses == * [[Copley Medal]], a scientific award granted by the Royal Society of London * [[Copley Press]], a California-based newspaper publisher {{disambiguation|geo}} [[it:Copley]]
